content.rendered:
Directed by Damian John Harper. Sabrina Sarabi.

Written by Stefanie Ren. Stefanie Ren. Paul Salisbury. Jakob Weydemann. Jonas Weydemann. Jonas Weydemann. Nicki Bloom. Damian John Harper. Sabrina Sarabi.

Cast Hanna Hilsdorf (Benni). Peter Kurth (Christoph). Hadewych min/Epis (Susi). Sebastian HÃ¼lk (Simon Geiger). Lucia Kotikova (Stella Rahn). Sohel Altan Gol (Bijan Asfari). Aniol Kirberg (Adam). Amira Ghazalla (Domin/Epique Wandler). Ã–zay Fecht (Anja Lemmerz). Julia Jenkins (Uli Krohn). Timo Fakhravar (Cem). Tala al Deen (Samar Al-Badri). Adnan Maral (Farouk Asfari). Robert Beyer (Karsten Thule). Nico Holonics (Lawyer Adam). Philipp Mauritz (Lawyer Adam). Rainer Furch (Sepp Karlsberg). Marc Barthel (Nico). Michael Baderschneider (Mr. Hubrecht). Nicole Johannhanwahr (Clerk). Birgit Berthold (Head Cleaner). Dmitriy Frid (Alexander Daniloff). Seumas F. Sargent (Tom Grant (uncredited))

Language German.

Producers Maria Cervera. Jakob Weydemann. Jonas Weydemann.

Production Weydemann Bros.

Creators Jakob Weydemann. Jonas Weydemann.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status On Going (2023–)
